title: Advice From Mom | Adina Miccio
itunes:title: Advice From Mom | Adina Miccio
description:
Happy (almost) Thanksgiving! It’s a family affair this week, as Brooke sits down with her mother - Adina! Brooke interviews mom about her life and career, and shares some valuable tips and advice!

channels on YouTube!
